leadText.title: Import substitution
leadText.description: Rosneft OC PJSC has been implementing a Program of Localization and Import Substitution of Machinery and Technologies since 2015

content.text: Development of Rosneft as a high-tech oil and gas company through the use of promising import-substituting technologies and products
Ensuring the technologically stable position of Rosneft in the petroleum products market by increasing the share of Russian products
Development of infrastructure for the implementation of projects in the field of exploration, production, processing and transportation of oil and gas through the localization of production

infoList.title: Company's actions to achieve the Program Objectives:

items.title: Investments
items.text: On a regular basis, it invests in its own import-substituting technologies and production (within the framework of the targeted innovative projects implementation)

items.title: Cooperation
items.text: Rosneft cooperates with the leading equipment manufacturers for the oil and gas industry

items.title: Conducting tests
items.text: Providing pilot testing of new equipment/technologies at the Company's sites

items.title: Interaction
items.text: Interacting with federal agencies on import substitution and localization.

items.title:
Attraction
of companies
items.text: Attracting the Companies of the Rosneft’s Engineering Cluster Group as a priority site for manufacturing pilot batches and further equipment production

items.title:
Stimulation
of import substitution
items.text: Stimulating import substitution within the framework of Rosneft procurement activities

cards.title: Pilot tests at the Rosneft site
Rosneft regularly interacts with the territorial entities of the Russian Federation on import substitution and localization issues

items.text: Rosneft regularly interacts with the territorial entities of the Russian Federation on import substitution and localization issues. The company works with regional manufacturers of equipment and materials, implementing the Company's Localization and Import Substitution Program
